verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib, <S%H24><s%> and keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

You shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd, <S%H1241><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there. <S%H7931><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> with it. <S%H398><s%> You shall eat unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> with it seven days, <S%H4682><s%> even the bread of affliction; <S%H6040><s%> for you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in haste: <S%H2649><s%> that you may remember <S%H2142><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%>

No yeast shall be <S%H7200><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> with you in all your borders <S%H1366><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> neither shall any of the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> which you sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> all night until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

You may <S%H3201><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> within any <S%H259><s%> of your gates, <S%H8179><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you; <S%H5414><s%>

but at the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell in, <S%H2076><s%> there you shall sacrifice the Passover <S%H6453><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> at the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> at the season <S%H4150><s%> that you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

You shall roast <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%> and you shall turn <S%H6437><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to your tents. <S%H168><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%> On the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no work. <S%H4399><s%>

You shall count <S%H5608><s%> for yourselves seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks: <S%H7620><s%> from the time you begin <S%H2490><s%> to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the standing grain <S%H7054><s%> you shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks. <S%H7620><s%>

You shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> which you shall give, <S%H5414><s%> according as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> blesses you: <S%H1288><s%>

and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> and your son, and your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and your male servant, <S%H5650><s%> and your female servant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> who is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> and the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> and the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> who are in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H4725><s%> in the place which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there. <S%H7931><s%>
You shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a bondservant <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes. <S%H2706><s%>

You shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> after that you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in from your threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor and from your winepress: <S%H3342><s%>

and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your feast, <S%H2282><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> and your son, and your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and your male servant, <S%H5650><s%> and your female servant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> and the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> who are within your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

You shall keep a feast <S%H2287><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all your increase, <S%H8393><s%> and in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and you shall be altogether joyful. <S%H8056><s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> shall all your males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose: <S%H977><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks, <S%H7620><s%> and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents; <S%H5521><s%> and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> empty: <S%H7387><s%>
every man <S%H376><s%> shall give as he is able, <S%H4979><s%> according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which he has given you. <S%H5414><s%>

You shall make <S%H5414><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> in all your gates, <S%H8179><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H7626><s%> according to your tribes; and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

You shall not wrest <S%H5186><s%> justice: <S%H4941><s%> you shall not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons; <S%H6440><s%> neither shall you take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe; <S%H7810><s%> for a bribe <S%H7810><s%> does blind <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> and pervert <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

You shall follow <S%H7291><s%> that which is altogether <S%H6664><s%> just, <S%H6664><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you. <S%H5414><s%>

You shall not plant <S%H5193><s%> for yourselves an Asherah <S%H842><s%> of any kind of tree <S%H6086><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which you shall make for yourselves. <S%H6213><s%>
Neither shall you set yourself up <S%H6965><s%> a pillar; <S%H4676><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hates. <S%H8130><s%>
